description: Congratulations to team member Binchi Zhang for his incoming PhD candidacy at University of Virginia, under supervision of Prof. Jundong Li!
"Knowledge Graph Augmented Political Perspective Detection in News Media" is significantly updated and available at

"Legislator Representation Learning with Social Context and Expert Knowledge", formerly "Encoding Heterogeneous Social and Political Context for Entity Stance Prediction", is significantly updated and availble at
Our paper, "Heterogeneity-aware Twitter Bot Detection with Relational Graph Transformers", has been accepted at AAAI 2022.
Our paper, "PPSGCN: A Privacy-Preserving Subgraph Sampling Based Distributed GCN Training Method", goes live on Arxiv. Check out our work at

Congratulations to team members Herun Wan, Ningnan Wang, Zilong Chen, Qingyao Li, Peisheng Yu for their incoming PhD candidacy!</br>
Herun Wan is joining Prof. Minnan Luo's lab @ XJTU.</br>
Ningnan Wang is joining Prof. Hongbin Sun's lab @ XJTU.</br>
Zilong Chen is joining Prof. Huaping Liu's lab @ THU.</br>
Qingyao Li is joining Prof. Yong Yu's lab @ SJTU.</br>
Peisheng Yu is joining Prof. Man-cho-so's lab @ CUHK.
Our paper, "BotRGCN: Twitter Bot Detection with Relational Graph Convolutional Networks", has been accepted at ASONAM 2021.
Our paper, "Heterogeneity-aware Twitter Bot Detection with Relational Graph Transformers", goes live on Arxiv. Check out our work at
Our paper, "SATAR: A Self-supervised Approach to Twitter Account Representation Learning and its Application in Bot Detection", has been accepted at CIKM 2021.
Our paper, "TwiBot-20: A Comprehensive Twitter Bot Detection Benchmark", has been accepted at CIKM 2021.
Our paper, "Knowledge Graph Augmented Political Perspective Detection in News Media", goes live on Arxiv. Check out our work at
Our paper, "Encoding Heterogeneous Social and Political Context for Entity Stance Prediction", goes live on Arxiv. Check out our work at
Our paper, "BotRGCN: Twitter Bot Detection with Relational Graph Convolutional Networks", goes live on Arxiv. Check out our work at
